Run from anywhere in the world![/vc_hoverbox][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_hoverbox image=”622″ primary_title=”Princess Pageant” primary_title_font_container=”color:%23ffffff” primary_title_use_theme_fonts=”yes” hover_title=”Banana Split Princess” shape=”square” hover_background_color=”purple” hover_btn_title=”Meet the Contestants” hover_btn_color=”turquoise” use_custom_fonts_primary_title=”true” hover_add_button=”true” primary_title_el_class=”display-block font-family-alt letter-spacing-2 text-medium text-uppercase text-white” hover_btn_link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fbananasplitfest.com%2Fschedule%2Fprincess-pageant%2F|||”]Naming of the Banana Split Princess and her Court[/vc_hoverbox][vc_hoverbox image=”902″ primary_title=”Coloring Contest” primary_title_font_container=”color:%23ffffff” primary_title_use_theme_fonts=”yes” hover_title=”Coloring Contest” shape=”square” hover_background_color=”purple” hover_btn_title=”Get the Sheet” hover_btn_shape=”square” hover_btn_color=”turquoise” use_custom_fonts_primary_title=”true” hover_add_button=”true” hover_btn_link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fbananasplitfest.com%2Fschedule%2Fcoloring-contest%2F|title:Coloring%20Contest||” primary_title_el_class=”display-block font-family-alt letter-spacing-2 text-medium text-uppercase text-white” hover_btn_el_class=”text-white” primary_title_link=”|||”]Stay inside the lines or color outside of them to make the sheet your own[/vc_hoverbox][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_hoverbox image=”722″ primary_title=”Pie Eating Contest” primary_title_font_container=”color:%23ffffff” primary_title_use_theme_fonts=”yes” hover_title=”Eat’n Park Restaurant Pie Eating Contest” shape=”square” hover_background_color=”purple” use_custom_fonts_primary_title=”true” primary_title_el_class=”display-block font-family-alt letter-spacing-2 text-medium text-uppercase text-white”]Who will eat an entire banana creme pie the fastest and be named champion?[/vc_hoverbox][/vc_column][vc_column]

And so much more! Be sure to take a peek at the full schedule .
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row opacity_bg_pattern=”0.1″ el_class=”section_padding” el_id=”about”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-9″]

The Virtual Experience

COVID may have put a freeze on getting everyone together for an in-person celebration, but that doesn't mean we can't still have fun eating ice cream all across the world!

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″]

Over 115 years ago in the Western PA town of Latrobe, David Strickler, a pharmacy apprentice, created what may be the most famous sundae of all time — the banana split!

Latrobe has had an annual celebration since 2013 when the Pennsylvania Historical Society unveiled a marker at the former site of Tassel's Pharmacy where Sticker was working at the time of his invention.
But the banana split isn't the only world-changing thing to come from Latrobe! This town just outside of Pittsburgh was where Fred Rogers of Mister Roger's Neighborhood grew up. It's also where Arnold Palmer was raised and started his golf career at Latrobe Country Club. The town boasts the annual Westmoreland County Air Show, Steelers Training Camp, the original home of Rolling Rock Beer, and St. Vincent College.

Check Schedule
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-6″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1596308988784{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-4″]
Tune In

Right here online
or on our Facebook page

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1596308993622{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-4″]
Entertainment

Musical guests and variety performances.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1596308999349{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-4″]
Date

August 25, 2020
National Banana Split Day

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” opacity_bg_pattern=”0.1″ el_id=”email-signup” css=”.vc_custom_1596257614179{background-color: #a8f1f8 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1596260319136{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-9″]

Get the Inside Scoop

Add your email address to find out the latest happenings with the Banana Split Celebration

[vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”688″ parallax_speed_bg=”1″ opacity_bg_pattern=”0.5″ ova_bg_pattern=”#000000″ el_id=”valleydairy”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-7 vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-offset-7 vc_col-md-5″]

Banana Split, USA

We're looking for hometown shops all across the USA that have their own unique twist on the flavors of the original banana split. Maybe its ice cream based. Perhaps it's a baked treat. It could be a drink. Or maybe it's something we're not even thinking about. Whatever it is and wherever it is, we want to know.

I know a Banana Split shop!
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row opacity_bg_pattern=”0.1″ css=”.vc_custom_1596267013545{padding-top: 135px !important;}” el_id=”entertainment”][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1596266840282{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2 vc_col-xs-12″]

ENTERTAINMENT

We're assembling a great line up of musical entertainers and other performances for this year's online event. The full list will be up shortly, but here are headliners from past years!

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row opacity_bg_pattern=”0.1″ el_id=”entertainment”][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-xs-6″]
The Clarks
The Clarks
The Clarks played the Banana Split Celebration in 2015. The American rock band, originated at Indiana University of Pennsylvania and in 30+ years has produced eleven studio albums, two live albums, 2 compilation albums, an EP, and four solo releases.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-xs-6″]
Kellie Pickler
Kellie Pickler
Country music singer, songwriter, actress, and TV personality performed at the 2016 Banana Split Celebration. Her 2006 debut album had the hit songs ``Red High Heels,`` ``I Wonder,`` and ``Things That Never Cross a Man's Mind.``
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-xs-6″]
The Commonheart
The Commonheart
Playing in 2017 with their gritty vocals over rock riffs and horns, The Commonheart delivered an emotion-packed, soulful sound that lit up the downtown streets of Latrobe.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-xs-6″]
Vertigo Red
Vertigo Red
In 2018, VERTIGO RED a party rock cover band from Annapolis performed covers of a variety of music from today's radio pop-rock to 80s/90s retro favorites to modern country.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-xs-6″]
Joe Grushecky
Joe Grushecky
Playing to a packed crowd, Joe Grushecky & The Houserockers did, in fact, rock the house of Latrobe in 2019. A Rolling Stone review once said of the band, ``they are up there with Springsteen, Petty and Seger``.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-xs-6″]
Perform at the Celebration
Perform at the Celebration
We're looking for musical artists and other entertainers to be part of the 2020 celebration.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-3 vc_col-xs-12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row opacity_bg_pattern=”0.1″ el_id=”schedule” el_class=”section_padding” css=”.vc_custom_1494398309465{padding-top: 135px !important;}”][vc_column]

EVENT SCHEDULE

Three scoops of ice cream. A whole banana. Syrups. Whipped cream. And a cherry. That's a pretty sweet dessert. To match all that, we have a pretty sweet schedule of events and activites.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″]
